long_description: This replacement hipbelt fits the women's REI Crestrail 65 backpack. It incorporates a pivoting design for balance and stability forward-pull ergonomics for easy adjustment. ActivMotion(R) design pivots to follow the natural motion of your hips, helping keep the pack balanced and stable on your back when hiking on uneven terrain. Precurved hipbelt is designed to cradle hip bones for a natural fit and to distribute weight without sagging. Hipbelt webbing system allows you to use a natural forward pulling motion for quick, easy cinching and precise adjustment. Zippered hipbelt pockets store those small essentials you want at your finger tips, such as lip balm and sunscreen.
short_description: This replacement hipbelt fits the women's REI Crestrail 65 backpack. It incorporates a pivoting design for balance and stability forward-pull ergonomics for easy adjustment.
